body:
Comment 7: 
It looks like you are hitting "INT $3" instruction in:

TEXT runtimeÂ·morestack(SB),7,$0
        // Cannot grow scheduler stack (m->g0).
        MOVQ    m_g0(BX), SI
        CMPQ    g(CX), SI
        JNE     2(PC)
        INT     $3
...

but you shouldn't be there. I am not sure why you are there.

Looking at you stack trace, there is ImmUnlockIMC from imm32.dll there. I don't think
the program you have provided would be executing it. Are you sure, the sources you have
provided are correct?

Alex
